mapper.sql: select T1.BUILDING_ID,T1.BUILDING_NAME,T1.BUILDING_ADDRESS,T3.OID from T_DC_AREA_BUILDING_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN T_BUILDING_BAND_INFO T3 ON T1.BUILDING_ID = T3.BUILDING_ID left join T_DC_GRID T2 on T1.GRID_ID=T2.GRID_ID and t2.status='001'

WHERE T1.STATUS='001'
AND T1.GRID_ID in(select T3.GRID_ID from T_DC_GRID T3 where T3.STATUS = '001' START WITH T3.GRID_ID=#{gridId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} CONNECT BY PRIOR T3.GRID_ID = T3.PARENT_GRID_ID)
AND instr(T2.INFO_ORG_CODE,#{infoOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})=1 AND T2.INFO_ORG_CODE LIKE CONCAT(#{infoOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND T1.BUILDING_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND T1.BUILDING_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{buildingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND (T3.OID = '' OR T3.OID IS NULL)
AND (T3.OID IS NOT NULL)

SELECT * FROM T_CAR_TRAJECTORY_INFO T WHERE 1=1
AND T.CAR_ID= #{carId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND T.MAP_TYPE= #{mapType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.LOCAL_TIME >TO_DATE(#{startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
AND T.LOCAL_TIME >=SYSDATE -10/(24*60*60)
AND T.LOCAL_TIME >TO_DATE(#{startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') AND T.LOCAL_TIME<TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY T.CAR_ID ASC,T.CAR_TRAJECTORY_ID ASC
